programme.title: And the Crows Will Dig Your Grave
programme.desc: After the Civil War, Wells Fargo hires gunmen to protect against increasing bandit attacks. Jeff Sullivan, driven by revenge for his murdered wife, joins the team to hunt down Glenn Kovacks and his gang. Alongside bounty hunter Pancho Corrales, Sullivan faces treachery, culminating in a deadly showdown where only he survives to save a prisoner.

programme.title: The Shooting
programme.desc: A mysterious woman persuades two cowboys to help her in a revenge scheme.

programme.title: Killer Goodbye
programme.desc: A young man goes back to his hometown ten years after killing the killer of his parents. Once there he is asked to help the sheriff.

programme.title: Return of Shanghai Joe
programme.desc: A sinister town boss called Pat Barnes has exploited almost everyone in the town.

programme.title: Kill the Wicked!
programme.desc: Good Samaritan drifter, Benny Hudson and a stranded woman, Jenny finds themselves being torture; when they accidentally walk into an gang's hideout in a ghost town.

programme.title: Ben and Charlie
programme.desc: Two likable bandits try to make a living in the Old West.

programme.title: For a Book of Dollars
programme.desc: A bounty hunter named Amen is hired by a group of nuns to recover stolen money. However, the nuns turn out to be female desperadoes in disguise, plotting to retrieve the booty pillaged by the ruthless outlaw Catapult and his gang. Amen must navigate a world of deception, danger, and betrayal to complete the job.

programme.title: Two Brothers in Trinity
programme.desc: After inheriting a land plot in a dusty place called Trinity, the antagonistic half-brothers, Lester and Jesse, reunite to pursue different aspirations, only to find themselves neck-deep in trouble. Will they ever fulfil their dreams?

programme.title: Django the Last Killer
programme.desc: Ramon's parents are killed by men of landowner John Barrett. While trying to get revenge, Ramon is wounded but has saved the life of Rezza, an old disillusioned killer.

programme.title: Seven Alone
programme.desc: A frontier family crosses the U.S. by wagon train, hoping for a better life in the Oregon Territory.

programme.title: The Legend of the Lone Ranger
programme.desc: The sole surviving Texas Ranger (Klinton Spilsbury) of an ambush arranged by outlaw leader Major Bartholomew "Butch" Cavendish (Christopher Lloyd) returns to fight back as a great masked western hero, The Lone Ranger.

programme.title: Ramon the Mexican
programme.desc: Ramon avenges his brother's murder and kills the Baxter Family.

programme.title: May God Forgive You... But I Won't
programme.desc: While Cjamango is away from his ranch six bandits attack and kill all the members of his family.

programme.title: Silent Thunder
programme.desc: A US Marshal teams up with two bank robbers to track down five kidnapped prostitutes. But their captors aren’t ordinary outlaws—they are terrifying, otherworldly creatures lurking in the desert. As the unlikely trio ventures into the unknown, they face horrors beyond their imagination in a desperate fight for survival.
